Here we prepare supp table 4 with genetic pairs data: first sheet phenotype, second sheet mutations

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(writexl)
rm(list = ls())
```

# Import phentype

```{r}
pheno <- readRDS("../Genetic_pairs/processed_data/PI_pairs_data/pairs_description_dataframe.Rda") %>%
  filter(PI_pair)

supp_table4_prepare <- list(phenotype = pheno)
```

# Mutations

```{r}
mutations <- readRDS("../../../VANANZ_phenotypes_local/Genetic_pairs_analysis_Oct_2020/processed_data/convergence/PI/df_PI_convergent_genes.Rda")

supp_table4_prepare$mutations <- mutations
```

# Export as supplementary table

```{r}
supp_table4_prepare %>%
  write_xlsx("processed_data/supp_table_4/supp_table_4.xlsx")
```
